page.title: 06Zeal Monachorum Church Fete
page.content:
Although the village has a mix of locals and 'newcomers', the sense of community is strong. Regular events throughout the year are supported and enjoyed by everyone in the village and surrounding area.
Prehaps the major event each year is the {CHURCH FETE}, held in mid-July in the grounds of Napelton House. The fete gives an opportunity for neighbours to meet; enjoy a wide variety of games and pick up bargins at the white elephant and produce stalls. For many, the highlight is to sit in te courtyard drinking tea and eating home-made cakes.
Later in the summer gardeners, cooks, artists and home winemakers compete in a friendly atmosphere in the P T O . . . . . .
